title: The Million-Dollar Night View!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>So, what do you think about the Oharas’ helicopter ride experience?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Well, it’s not bad.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, that’s good to hear! Alright, let’s go to the million-dollar night view~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Million-dollar, huh? That’s a bold claim. Can it even beat what NYC looks like at night?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>You’ll just have to go and see♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Behold! This is Numazu’s million-dollar night view~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Eh....? I can’t really see anything.... There are almost no lights either....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Not down there, look up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Waaa! I’ve never seen a starry sky like this before! Amazing, this is amazing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
